channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-12367] Lock/unlock database should add current database to inputs and outputs of authz hook
item.summary: Lock/unlock database should add current database to inputs and outputs of authz hook

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Dapeng Sun, the fix version shouldn't be set until the patch is committed so I've moved your fix versions into target versions.

  • JIRA Guidelines
Lefty Leverenz, got it. Thank you for your information.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12772091 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build
+0.9 from me. The patch makes sense, Alan Gates can you double check?
Also, tests failed. Do files need the out file update?

The test failures definitely look relevant and need to be fixed or regenerated.

The patch looks fine. A comment on why you are selecting DDL_NO_LOCK in the lock function would be helpful, since it's confusing. Also, analyzeLockTable and analyzeUnlockTable suffer from the same problem. I don't know if you want to fix those as well.

Thank Sergey Shelukhin and Alan Gates.

Do files need the out file update?

Thank you for pointing out it. I will update the out files.

A comment on why you are selecting DDL_NO_LOCK in the lock function would be helpful, since it's confusing.

How about using DDL_SHARED or DDL_EXCLUSIVE (depends on lock mode) at Lock and using DDL_NO_LOCK at Unlock

analyzeLockTable and analyzeUnlockTable suffer from the same problem. I don't know if you want to fix those as well.

Thank you for pointing out it. I'm willing to, I will update it at this ticket or file another jira to fix it, do you think it is okay?
I think the lock should still be DDL_NO_LOCK, I misunderstand LOCK and DDL_LOCK...

I agree that DDL_NO_LOCK is the right annotation, even on the lock side. I think a comment on why it's right in the code would be helpful, since when I first looked at it it confused me.

As for whether you do the tables in this ticket or another is up to you, I think either is fine.
Updated the patch

Hi Alan Gates, I have updated the comment of DDL_NO_LOCK, I also created HIVE-12495, it will also depend on the newly added method isExplicitLockOperation(), otherwise Driver will acquire shared lock for ReadEntity.

Could you help me commit it if you don't have further questions? Thank you.
